text: Those who presented credentials were Malta High Commissioner, Stephen Borg, New Zealand High Commissioner, Joanna Mary Kempkers, Indonesian Ambassador, Gusti Ngurah Ardiyasa and Nepal Ambassador, Prof Bishwambher Pyakuryal.Two High Commissioners and Two Ambassador presented credentials to President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidential Secretariat today (8th May). Those who presented credentials were Malta High Commissioner, Stephen Borg, New Zealand High Commissioner, Joanna Mary Kempkers, Indonesian Ambassador, Gusti Ngurah Ardiyasa and Nepal Ambassador, Prof Bishwambher Pyakuryal.
title: Four new envoys present credentials to President
